blogPost.excerpt: Now Sheet Monkey lets you send your forms directly to Notion Databases. It's perfect for Webflow, Carrd, static HTML sites. It eliminates the need for backend code and takes seconds to get started.
blogPost.body: Now Sheet Monkey lets you send your forms directly to Notion Databases. It's perfect for Webflow, Carrd, static HTML sites. It eliminates the need for backend code and takes seconds to get started.
